attributes.action: Resurface harepie lane and sort drainage issue
attributes.additional_details: Complaints have been made on a regular basis to the highways agency. The only response I have had is that there is no budget to repair the road however 500 yards up the road repairs are continually made  to repair the most minor defects.
attributes.background: Harepie lane  has been in a very poor condition for many years now.  Blocked drains cause water to find alternate routes causing deep channels.  The road is  severely damaging cars of local residents, For the half mile stretch harepie lane is full of potholes worn out road surfaces.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Road maintenance is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
